org.pmedv.forms
Class AbstractActionForm

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.struts.action.ActionForm
      org.pmedv.forms.AbstractActionForm
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractBaseForm, CategoryForm, CategoryShowForm, ContentForm, ContentListForm, ContentShowForm, ForumForm, ForumShowForm, PostingForm, ThreadForm
public abstract class AbstractActionForm
extends org.apache.struts.action.ActionForm

This abstract form is a subclass of org.apache.struts.action.ActionForm Inside this CMS every form has an icon and a name in order to display a title bar inside the jsp view.

Author:
Matthias Pueski
See Also:
Serialized Form
